casebody.data:
MATTHEWS, WILSON & MATTHEWS, INC., Debtor, Matthews, Wilson & Matthews, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. PEOPLES COMMUNITY BANK OF SOUTH CAROLINA, Defendant-Appellee. No. 06-16054

Non-Argument Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. April 18, 2007. Elliott Brian Watkins, E. Brian Watkins, P.C., Atlanta, GA, for Plaintiff-Appellant. Joseph Noel Schweers, III, J. Noel Schweers III, PC, Augusta, GA, for Defendant-Appellee. Before CARNES, DUBINA, and HILL, Circuit Judges. PER CURIAM:

We have carefully reviewed the record, the briefs of the parties and the order of the district judge. Finding no reversible error therein, the judgment in favor of defendant/appellee is

AFFIRMED.
